description: Part of Engineering Week, this event provides girls with tours of engineering labs, mentorship, and interactive sessions. Location: [Various Locations - Check Local Listings]

description: The world’s largest conference for women engineers and technologists offering career development, networking, and mentoring. Location: [Los Angeles, CA]

description: An annual summit for LGBTQ+ individuals in STEM fields, featuring workshops, panels, and networking opportunities. Location: [Anaheim, CA]
